title: crushing game
body: My game has started crushing since patch 6.20 and worlds update. Its been crushing my whole pc in random moments of game, i even got a 20 min ban bcs of that which u can guess is really annoying, anybody know what is going on?

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more information.  For example, what do you mean exactly by crashing?  When exactly is it happening, and what do you see?  Are there any error messages?  Let me know!

I may have come up with solution that i found on pist from 4 months ago and that is to turn off the recording in my windows 10 xbox app that turned on for no reason and last game it didnt crush so the problem might be solved, i will try another game and if it will crush again we will think about the solution, but thanks for help anyway
